```{r , include=FALSE}
pone=function(n,k,strategy,nreps){
  if(strategy==1){
    boxes=1:2*n
    card=sample(2*n,2*n)
    successes=0
    for (i in 1:nreps){
      set.seed(3*i)
      card=sample(2*n,2*n)
      attempt=1
      card_num=card[k]
      while(attempt<n)
        {
         attempt=attempt+1
        if (card_num==k){
         successes=successes+1
         break}
        else
          card_num=card[card_num]
        }
    
    }
      prob=successes/nreps
      return(prob)
    
  }
  if(strategy==2){
    k_2=sample(2*n,1)
    boxes=1:2*n
    successes=0
     for (i in 1:nreps){
      set.seed(3*i)
       card=sample(2*n,2*n)
      attempt=1
      card_num=card[k_2]
      while(attempt<n)
        {
         attempt=attempt+1
        if (card_num==k_2){
         successes=successes+1
         break}
        else
          card_num=card[card_num]
        }
    
    }
    prob=successes/nreps
    return(prob)
    
 }
  if(strategy==3){
    boxes=1:2*n
    successes=0
     for (i in 1:nreps){
      set.seed(3*i)
      k_3=sample(2*n,1)
      card=sample(2*n,2*n)
      boxes=sample(2*n,n)
      if(any(boxes==k_3)==TRUE)
        successes=successes+1
    }
    prob=successes/nreps
    return(prob)
    
  }
}
```
